mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_user_info(user_id, group_id, role_id) VALUES(#{userId},#{groupId},#{roleId})
mapper.select: SELECT gui.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickName FROM group_user_info gui JOIN user u ON gui.user_id = u.id WHERE gui.group_id = #{groupId} GROUP BY userId

SELECT inv.id AS invitation_id, inv.receiver_email AS receiver_email, u.nickname AS receiver_nickname, inv.status AS status, inv.created_at AS created_at, inv.responded_at AS responded_at FROM invitation inv JOIN user u ON inv.receiver_email = u.email WHERE inv.group_id = #{groupId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_role_request(user_id, role_id, group_id) VALUES(#{userId},#{roleId},#{groupId})
